constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIGH Name: South of the Borough
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Details required by condition 3 (Car Parking Details), Condition 5 (Cycle parking Facilities) and Condition 6 (Refuse and Recycling Facilities) of planning permission: 19/01246/FUL (Change of use from Residential (Class C3) to Dental Practice (Class D1)
decision_conditions: The details submitted for Conditions 3 (Car Parking Details), Condition 5 (Cycle parking Facilities) and Condition 6 (Refuse and Recycling Facilities) of planning permission: 19/01246/FUL by the applicant are considered satisfactory and these conditions are hereby fully discharged.

The proposed alterations are considered to fall within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A  of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Your prior notification will be determined by the documents submitted. It is to your benefit to provide copies of existing and proposed elevations at a recognised scale of 1:50 or 1:100, providing a scale bar, showing all elevations not just part and indicating all key dimensions for the proposed work.Please note that the submitted drawing of extractor system does not show a scale bar/key dimensions. Please amend and resubmit.
